trans-unit.source: Use `dotnet workload search` to find additional workloads to install.
trans-unit.target: Используйте `dotnet workload search`, чтобы найти дополнительные рабочие нагрузки для установки.

trans-unit.source: Found workload version {0} pinned in the global.json file at {1}.
trans-unit.target: Found workload version {0} pinned in the global.json file at {1}.

trans-unit.source: Found workload version {0} pinned in the global.json file at {1}, but it was not installed. Running `dotnet workload install`, `dotnet workload update`, or `dotnet workload restore` may fix this.
trans-unit.target: Found workload version {0} pinned in the global.json file at {1}, but it was not installed. Running `dotnet workload install`, `dotnet workload update`, or `dotnet workload restore` may fix this.

trans-unit.source: Updates are available for the following workload(s): {0}. Run `dotnet workload update` to get the latest.
trans-unit.target: Обновления доступны для следующих рабочих нагрузок: {0}. Чтобы получить последнюю версию, запустите `dotnet workload update`.
